title: What are some seminar topics in geology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Seminar topics tend to apply to graduate level courses or sometimes, 4th year undergrad courses. They tend to be fairly specialized topics related to some speciality, e.g. Petroleum geology: topic might be on finding natural gas sweet spots in shale basins for horizontal drilling and fracking. Plate tectonics: topic might be predicting mantel plumes that drive divergent plate zones. Exoplanet geology: the geology of Mars. or what we know about the geology of other planets and moons in our solar system. Its part of the reductionist scientific approach.
